release.action: Fixed data store engine errors (via "collector-core" dependency update).
Fixed "Connection Pool Shut Down" error (from collector-core update).
Can now automatically stop a crawler when it reached a certain number of crawler events, thanks to the new Collector Core "StopCrawlerOnMaxEventListener" class.
Can now send deletion requests to Committers based on "rejected" events thanks to the new Collector Core "DeleteRejectedEventListener" class.
Added optional deduplication feature based on metadata and/or document checksums.
Added support for ETag/If-None-Match to GenericHttpFetcher.
Added supports HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) to GenericHttpFetcher. Active by default.
Added support for restricting which HTTP method GenericHttpFetcher accepts.
Added "DISABLED", "OPTIONAL", "REQUIRED" options for HTTP HEAD and GET methods.
New DOMLinkExtractor repeatable "extractSelector" and "noExtractSelector".
HttpCrawlerConfig metadata checksummer move to base class CrawlerConfig.
DOMLinkExtractor configurable "dom" elements deprecated in favor of "linkSelector".
Checksummers "disabled" flag deprecated in favor of setting a null checksummer or using a self-closed checksummer tag in config.
Fixed invalid configuration in POM "maven-dependency-plugin".

release.description: Changes since last milestone for this upcoming major release.
release.action: Removed JEF dependency in favor of improved JMX for tracking.
WebDriver HttpSniffer can now have its max buffer size configured.
Fixed NullPointerException when resolving sitemaps.
Fixed sitemap.xml URL entries not being extracted when they contain custom elements.
New IHttpFetcher for making HTTP requests. Multiple instances can now be specified and tried in sequence. This replaces IHttpClientFactory, IHttpDocumentFetcher, and IHttpMetadataFetcher.
New WebDriverHttpFetcher for using popular browsers in headless mode (Chrome, Firefox, ...). Ideal for Javascript-driven websites and taking screenshots.
Now supports If-Modified-Since for more efficient crawling.
New flag for loading start URLs asynchronously.
New HttpCollectorEvent.
New crawler event: URLS_POST_IMPORTED (in addition to new events from Collector Core).
New GenericHttpFetcher, replacing GenericHttpClientFactory and GenericHttpDocumentFetcher.
New "disableSNI" crawler configuration option to disable Server Name Indication.
New DOMLinkExtractor using JSoup to extract links.
Link extractors can now extracting links from metadata fields in addition to content.
New "postImportLinks" configuration option for considering links from metadata fields created during import for crawling (providing a way to extra links from parsed binaries).
New DOMLinkExtractor that uses JSoup to extract links from HTML/XML documents.
New HttpDoc, HttpDocInfo, HttpDocMetadata (new or renamed).
New metadata field set when URL changes from normalization: "collector.originalReference".
Form authentication can now parse and submit HTML forms (taking login page URL instead of form action URL).
PhantomJSDocumentFetcher now deprecated in favor of WebDriverHttpFetcher.
Now using XML class from Norconex Commons Lang for loading/saving configuration.
User-Agent no longer set directly on crawler config. It can be set on IHttpFetcher implementations that support it.
Now using SLF4J for logging.
HtmlLinkExtractor (and DOMLinkExtractor) now extracts all attributes of referrer links and adds them to the target document metadata. This can be disabled with the #setIgnoreLinkData() method.
Dependency updates: Norconex Collector Core 2.0.0, Jetty 9.4.12.v20180830.
Now requires Java 8 or higher.
Lists are now replacing arrays in most places.
Path is used in addition/instead of File in many places.
Default working directory structure has been improved.
Improved handling of "trustAllSSLCertificate" in GenericHttpFetcher by auto-accepting/storing certificates.
Dates handling now consider the zone.
Can now control whether to store as metadata all extracted links, just in-scope ones, out-of-scope, both, or none.
Link extractors and canonical URL classes are now in their own distinct packages.
GenericLinkExtractor renamed to HtmlLinkExtractor.
Sitemap information now stored in the new data store engine as opposed to its own storage mechanism.
URLStatusCrawlerEventListener now saves as CSV instead of TSV.
HttpCrawlerEvent now only holds HTTP crawler event names. Crawler events are now all of CrawlerEvent type.
Removed some code deprecated in releases before 3.0.0.
IHttpClientFactory, IHttpDocumentFetcher, and IHttpMetadataFetcher and implementations were removed in favor of IHttpFetcher and GenericHttpFetcher.
Removed "data" package (and its classes) in favor of new classes in "doc" package.
JDBC crawl store implementation has been removed in favor of NoSQL only (MVStore + MongoDB).
ISitemapResolverFactory removed in favor of ISitemapResolver.
Removed HttpCollectorEvent (now relying on CollectorEvent only).
